title: Awesome List Updates on Jul 22, 2021
_seo_title: Awesome List Updates on Jul 22, 2021 - Track Awesome List

items.title: Alternative Front Ends
items.content_text:
### Overview / YouTube

*   [youtube-local (⭐634)](https://github.com/user234683/youtube-local): Browser-based client for watching Youtube anonymously and with greater page performance
*   [yt-local](https://git.sr.ht/~heckyel/yt-local): Browser-based client for watching Youtube anonymously without forcing javascript (Fork of [youtube-local (⭐634)](https://github.com/user234683/youtube-local))
*   [SkyTube (⭐2.6k)](https://github.com/SkyTubeTeam/SkyTube): An open-source YouTube app for Android
items.content_html:
Overview / YouTube

  • youtube-local (⭐634): Browser-based client for watching Youtube anonymously and with greater page performance
  • yt-local: Browser-based client for watching Youtube anonymously without forcing javascript (Fork of youtube-local (⭐634))
  • SkyTube (⭐2.6k): An open-source YouTube app for Android

items.title: Awesome H2o
items.content_text:
### Research Papers

*   [Appendectomy during the COVID-19 pandemic in Italy: a multicenter ambispective cohort study by the Italian Society of Endoscopic Surgery and new technologies (the CRAC study)](https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/34219197/) Alberto Sartori, Mauro Podda, Emanuele Botteri, Roberto Passera, Ferdinando Agresta, Alberto Arezzo. (2021)
items.content_html:
Research Papers

  • Appendectomy during the COVID-19 pandemic in Italy: a multicenter ambispective cohort study by the Italian Society of Endoscopic Surgery and new technologies (the CRAC study) Alberto Sartori, Mauro Podda, Emanuele Botteri, Roberto Passera, Ferdinando Agresta, Alberto Arezzo. (2021)

items.title: Awesome Gbdev
items.content_text:
### ASM / Music drivers and trackers

*   [OAM DMA tutorial](https://gbdev.gg8.se/wiki/articles/OAM_DMA_tutorial) - Example of how to use OAM DMA in assembly.

### ASM / Boilerplates and libraries

*   [gb-template (⭐4)](https://github.com/gb-archive/gb-template) - A template with basic functions such as joypad input, DMA transfers, and map/tile data loading.

### ASM / Syntax highlighting packages

*   [PlantBoy (⭐1)](https://github.com/gb-archive/plantboy)
items.content_html:
ASM / Music drivers and trackers

  • OAM DMA tutorial - Example of how to use OAM DMA in assembly.

ASM / Boilerplates and libraries

  • gb-template (⭐4) - A template with basic functions such as joypad input, DMA transfers, and map/tile data loading.

ASM / Syntax highlighting packages

  • PlantBoy (⭐1)

items.title: Open Source Flutter Apps
items.content_text:
### Contents / Social Network

*   [Fedi (⭐147)](https://github.com/Big-Fig/Fediverse.app) - Open-source client for Pleroma and Mastodon social networks by [Big-Fig](https://github.com/Big-Fig)
items.content_html:
Contents / Social Network

  • Fedi (⭐147) - Open-source client for Pleroma and Mastodon social networks by Big-Fig

items.title: Awesome Cl
items.content_text:
### HTTP Servers / Clack plugins

*   [clath (⭐39)](https://github.com/BnMcGn/clath) - a single sign-on
    middleware for Clack. It allows basic login with OAuth1.0a, OAuth2
    and OpenID. At the time of writing, it supports authentication from
    Google, Twitter, LinkedIn, StackExchange, Reddit and Github. [Apache2.0](https://directory.fsf.org/wiki/License:Apache2.0).

### Shells, shells interfaces / Third-party APIs

*   [shcl (⭐330)](https://github.com/bradleyjensen/shcl) - a POSIX-like shell in Common Lisp. [Apache2.0](https://directory.fsf.org/wiki/License:Apache2.0).

### Apps / Third-party APIs

*   [Slite (⭐56)](https://github.com/tdrhq/slite/) - a SLIme-based TEst runner for FiveAM Tests. [Apache2.0](https://directory.fsf.org/wiki/License:Apache2.0)
    *   Slite interactively runs your Common Lisp tests (at the time of writing only FiveAM is supported). It allows you to see the summary of test failures, jump to test definitions, rerun tests with the debugger, all from inside Emacs.
items.content_html:
HTTP Servers / Clack plugins

  • clath (⭐39) - a single sign-on middleware for Clack. It allows basic login with OAuth1.0a, OAuth2 and OpenID. At the time of writing, it supports authentication from Google, Twitter, LinkedIn, StackExchange, Reddit and Github. Apache2.0.

Shells, shells interfaces / Third-party APIs

  • shcl (⭐330) - a POSIX-like shell in Common Lisp. Apache2.0.

Apps / Third-party APIs

  • Slite (⭐56) - a SLIme-based TEst runner for FiveAM Tests. Apache2.0
    • Slite interactively runs your Common Lisp tests (at the time of writing only FiveAM is supported). It allows you to see the summary of test failures, jump to test definitions, rerun tests with the debugger, all from inside Emacs.

items.title: Awesome Flutter
items.content_text:
### Map / Image Picker

*   [Map (⭐137)](https://github.com/xclud/flutter_map) <!--stargazers:xclud/flutter_map--> - Fully-fledged interactive Map widget for flutter written in pure Dart. Supports all platforms. by [Mahdi K. Fard](https://github.com/xclud/)
items.content_html:
Map / Image Picker

  • Map (⭐137) - Fully-fledged interactive Map widget for flutter written in pure Dart. Supports all platforms. by Mahdi K. Fard

items.title: Public Apis
items.content_text:
### Games & Comics

- API: [TCGdex](https://www.tcgdex.net/docs)

  Description: Multi languages Pokémon TCG Information

  Auth: No

  HTTPS: Yes

  CORS: Yes
items.content_html:
Games & Comics

  • API: TCGdex

    Description: Multi languages Pokémon TCG Information

    Auth: No

    HTTPS: Yes

    CORS: Yes

items.title: Awesome Geek Podcasts
items.content_text:
### In English

*   [Coding Over Cocktails](https://www.torocloud.com/podcast) - A podcast produced by Toro Cloud tackling issues faced by enterprises as they manage the process of digital transformation, application integration, low-code application development, data management, and business process automation.
items.content_html:
In English

  • Coding Over Cocktails - A podcast produced by Toro Cloud tackling issues faced by enterprises as they manage the process of digital transformation, application integration, low-code application development, data management, and business process automation.
